about_the_game:
This DLC is not compatible with an account created outside Steam.

This bundle includes the American Curtiss XP-31 Tier II premium fighter. This aircraft is armed with four machineguns, which make it a formidable opponent in the sky! In addition, you will receive days of Premium account, and a stock of supply crates in which you can find days of Premium Account, Premium aircraft, gold, Free XP, experimental equipment, and much more. You will also get a thematic emblem that gives a bonus (crew experience in each battle: +2%)!

DLC Content:
  • "Curtiss XP-31, USA Tier II fighter
  • 1 Hangar slot
  • 1 crew trained to 100%
  • 1 emblem
  • 3 days of Premium Account
  • 1 Supply crate
  • 2 Steel Supply Crates
detailed_description:
This DLC is not compatible with an account created outside Steam.

This bundle includes the American Curtiss XP-31 Tier II premium fighter. This aircraft is armed with four machineguns, which make it a formidable opponent in the sky! In addition, you will receive days of Premium account, and a stock of supply crates in which you can find days of Premium Account, Premium aircraft, gold, Free XP, experimental equipment, and much more. You will also get a thematic emblem that gives a bonus (crew experience in each battle: +2%)!

DLC Content:
  • "Curtiss XP-31, USA Tier II fighter
  • 1 Hangar slot
  • 1 crew trained to 100%
  • 1 emblem
  • 3 days of Premium Account
  • 1 Supply crate
  • 2 Steel Supply Crates

name: World of Warplanes - Curtiss XP-31 Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2xxx or higher
  • Graphics: Shaders 3.0 (NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT 512MB, Radeon HD 3870) / higher)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Minimum screen resolution: 1280х768
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2ххх, AMD FX 8xxx / higher
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 660 1GB, Radeon HD 7870 / higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Minimum screen resolution: 1280х768

short_description: This bundle includes the Curtiss XP-31 American Tier II fighter and additional goods.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French*, German*, Polish*, Czech*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Hungarian, Norwegian, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian, Croatian
*languages with full audio support
